channel.title: Fixing the Cult
channel.description:
I recomment getting rid of Cult Leader promotions after n3. Its too easy for cult to keep gaining members. Either that, or make it so cult can only have 3 members. Or cult can only convert every 3 days. Either way, they are too powerful.
If any of the above takes place, I highly recommend moving Eradicate to a different cultist to allow cult to kill and convert on the same day.

item.title: Fixing the Cult
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
they are different mechanics and strategies.

Cult cannot kill and convert on the same night, because they have one person who can do this. However, the converter is infinitely replaceable, the cult can have 4 members instead of 3, and can have more special abilities happen at night (unseen get 1 person for special abilities such as occupy and framing, cult get 3)
